passages.text:
Ah, a tourist! Welcome, welcome to my wonderful town! Are you from the city?
[[I'm just here to fish.|Fish]]
[[Which city?|City]]
passages.name: Start

passages.text:
Ah, yes! Fishing is wonderful, isn't it? One of my top ten favorite leisure activities! And, as luck may have it, one of our premiere vacation experiences! I can offer you some top-of-the-line, beginner-friendly fishing classes, perfect for your holiday! How does that sound?
[[Sorry, I'm not here for vacation.|No vacation]]

links.name: Sorry, I'm not here for vacation.|No vacation
links.link: Sorry, I'm not here for vacation.|No vacation

passages.name: Fish

passages.text:
Any city! Preferably one with lots of overworked and overpaid urbanites who you can tell about the beautiful, tranquil, and rejuvenating town you visited on your vacation!
[[Sorry, I'm just here to work.|No vacation]]

links.name: Sorry, I'm just here to work.|No vacation
links.link: Sorry, I'm just here to work.|No vacation

passages.name: City

passages.text:
Bah! You're just as frustrating as the rest of this town! Why is everyone so afraid of progress? Can't they see the opportunities provided by a naturally beautiful town like this? I'm talking development! Jobs! Income!
[[Continue]]
passages.name: No vacation

passages.text:
Wait! If you're new here, you'll be needing a place to stay. Fortunately, I happen to have a vacancy in my luxury mobile home facility. But those lodgings are reserved for the town's working class, and I don't give handouts. 
[[BackToItCONTD]]
passages.name: Back to it

passages.text: So if you want to have a place to stay, you'll have to contribute to the town as a whole. Come back once you've caught three fish and had them officially recorded by the identifier at the church. Then I'll know you're not a freeloader.
passages.name: BackToItCONTD

passages.text:
But most of these simpletons would rather leave their futures up to fate than take it into their own hands!
[[I'm going to get back to fishing now...|Back to it]]

links.name: I'm going to get back to fishing now...|Back to it
links.link: I'm going to get back to fishing now...|Back to it

passages.name: Continue
